cast.name: 布伦丹·奥卡罗尔 Brendan O'Carroll

this_title: Mrs. Brown’s Boys New Year’s 2024 - New Year, New Mammy
trans_title: 布朗夫人的儿子们：2024新年特别集
introduction: Mrs Brown and the gang start the New Year by attempting a tough new health and fitness regime. New year, new Agnes! But while Maria and Cathy work hard to get the gang into shape, a mysterious visitor to Finglas raises some difficult questions from Agnes and Winne’s past.
chinese_title: 布朗夫人的儿子们：2024新年特别集
foreign_title: Mrs. Brown’s Boys New Year’s 2024 - New Year, New Mammy
